channel.title: Omfg how d0 i edit nixscape?
channel.description: How do i edit nixscape? I made ym own server on it but i dunno how to remove some stuff like: ( under the run thing it says '' Nix Scape OWNZ'' how do i edit that?

item.title: Omfg how d0 i edit nixscape?
item.dc:creator: @Mobster144 Mobster144
item.description:
@Mobster144 wrote:

so… i cant make a server with bombscape then? cuz i used other sources and they all worked, i just cant edit anything and i cant make any characters.

would sum1 post a tutrorial so i can use a source ( idc what it is i have almost all sources.) so plzzz help

Read full topic

item.title: Omfg how d0 i edit nixscape?
item.dc:creator: @Mobster144 Mobster144
item.description:
@Mobster144 wrote:

yea, i know what to do to edit things, i just dunno what to edit. I tried using ‘’ BombScape’’ for making a server ( has got to be the easiest one for me) I made a character and i started the server. when i try and logg, it takes me back to the moparscape login page. if u can help me with this ( how to log in) I will never ask for help again on this thread

p.s. The Bombscape is Called: Bombscape[iNFUS3D]

p.s. Nix can i have yur new soucrce plz?

Read full topic

item.title: Omfg how d0 i edit nixscape?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

lol thats what u get for using my old source
Just log in via a client or use a php based registration script.

and for the editing things, learn how to use the find and replace feature of a basic text editor like notepad

Read full topic
